publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1189.1 Alison McInnes: Respect for Scottish Bank Notesâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-1189) in the name of Nigel Don, leave out from "calls for" to end and insert "welcomes the actions of Malcolm Bruce MP in leading cross-party calls in Westminster for the legal protection of Scottish bank notes across the United Kingdom."
